aqi

Status

  1. Good: Air quality is considered satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk
  2. Moderate: Air quality is acceptable; however, for some pollutants there may be a moderate health concern
  3. Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups: Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects
  4. Unhealty: Everyone may begin to experience health effects
  5. Very Unhealty: Health warnings of emergency conditions
  6. Hazardous: Health alert: everyone may experience more serious health effects
